key_experiences.title: Best Practices
key_experiences.description: We emphasize best engineering practices for every element of the course taught, from API design to frontend modularization.

key_experiences.title: Deploy
key_experiences.description: Learn how to deploy your web applications ot the cloud using service provider such as Heroku or the Google Cloud Platform.

key_experiences.title: Final Project
key_experiences.description: The class ends with a final project capstone project consolidating all class topics, which can be used on your resume or portfolio.
